Thanks to all the hard work put into the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/about/|LoCo Directory]]</nowiki>, LoCo Teams now have a place to schedule their meetings. If you have come here in search of information on our next IRC or Face-to-face event, Please visit the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-us-florida|Florida Team Page]]</nowiki> in the LoCo Directory. Any upcoming events including Florida Team Meetings will be listed there. Please feel free to click on the next upcoming meeting and add an agenda item or two.
